name: Cooking Voyage
description:
Do you love fast paced crazy cook games?
Are you crazy about time management games?
Are you excited about renovating your own yacht and traveling around the world to build your own restaurant empire?

If you say "YES", the FREE Cooking Voyage - Crazy Chef's Restaurant Dash Game is your choice of time-management game & food games madness. Download & Play the free cook game for you now! Serve up the hungry customers in the restaurant, you can also decorate your own unique yacht! You can’t miss it!

Cook like a chef with the cooking talent! Show your cook passion all the time, cook and serve delicious cuisines in each exotic restaurants all over the world to build your own restaurant empire. Sharpening your cook skills is not enough, master your time-management skills and spend your earnings on upgrades for food and appliances for your restaurant to be a five-star restaurant! Serve the hungry customers around the world and become the top in the cook events! You are destined for fabulous chef mega fame, just like famous chef Ramsey!
Pack the cook talents that your papa and mama give you. Let's continue the exciting cook game.
Did we say you will own a yacht? Board your own megayacht to begin your worldwide journey! Visit famous cities and unlock the most famous landmarks! To discover different food cultures and cook various cuisines with tons of ingredients in distinctive diner or cafe or restaurants. The journey will never be bored while you could give your megayacht a complete makeover! Decorate and renovate your bedroom, kitchen, hall and design other rooms in just the way you want! Explore your creativity with hundreds of design options and design your dream megayacht while playing this engaging cook game, restaurant game and kitchen game!

Features

COOK massive tasty cuisines and recipes with hundreds of ingredients
EXPAND your restaurant empire with distinct restaurants in different cities
TRAVEL to explore unique food cuisines around the world
A YACHT to discover for new rooms and minigames
RENOVATE and DESIGN what your own megayacht looks like
BUILD LANDMARKS in each city with your progression
UPGRADE your unique kitchen and ingredients for premium dishes
TAP to PLAY over 1000+ levels and more to come
CREATE COMBOS to earn extra coins
SERVE a variety of cute customers
PLAY OFFLINE
Download for FREE and play the frenzy Cooking Voyage!

Enjoying Cooking Voyage? Learn more about the game! https://www.facebook.com/cookingvoyage/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to support@newvoy.com.
